comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/27331537@N06] Original number was 148 (see locomotive) renumbered 1222 in the 1924 reclassification. Entered service in March 1880, built by Dubs and Company. Withdrawn June 1931, Condemned 22 June 1933 and scrapped 10 June 1937 - distance travelled 1,472,005 km. age at scrapping 68 years.

comment.author: 73199923@N00
comment._content: All is not lost Locomotive 1210 is still happily in steam making more hot air in Canberra :)
